sub{top:3px}footer-sitemap .element-text-standard-strong s{display:inline-block;position:relative;text-decoration:none}footer-sitemap .element-text-standard-strong s:before{color:red;position:absolute;content:"";left:0;top:50%;right:0;border-color:currentcolor #ee2929 #ee2929;border-top:1px solid .element-link-standard-soft:focus,footer-sitemap .element-link-standard-soft:hover{color:#00833d}footer-sitemap .sitemap-container{background-color:#fff}footer-sitemap .sitemap-group{min-width:150px;-webkit-box-flex:1;flex:1;padding:0 10px;position:relative}footer-sitemap .sitemap-links{margin:0;padding:0}footer-sitemap .sitemap-entry{list-style:none}footer-sitemap .sitemap-headline{margin:0 0 15px;list-style:none;outline:none}@media screen and (min-width:651px){footer-sitemap .sitemap-headline{pointer-events:none}footer-sitemap .accordion-handle{display:none}}footer-sitemap .sitemap-headline::-webkit-details-marker{display:none}footer-sitemap .sitemap-headline:before{content:""}footer-sitemap .image{display:inline}footer-sitemap .link-image{width:70px;margin:5px;vertical-align:top}footer-sitemap .sitemap-entry:not(.image):not(:last-child){margin-bottom:10px}footer-sitemap .sitemap-entry:not(.image) .sitemap-link{display:block}@media screen and (max-width:650px){footer-sitemap .sitemap-links{margin-bottom:15px}footer-sitemap .sitemap-headline{margin-top:15px}footer-sitemap .sitemap-headline .accordion-handle{content:"";position:absolute;display:block;right:15px;top:0;width:20px;height:49px;background-image:url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 20 12' fill='%23929292'
